content: हारः [हृ-कर्मणि घञ्] {@--1@} Taking away, removal, seizing. {@--2@} Conveying. {@--3@} Abstraction, deprivation. {@--4@} A carrier, porter. {@--5@} A garland or necklace of pearls &c.; a necklace in general; हारोयं हरिणाक्षीणां लुठति स्तनमंडले <ls>Amaru. 100</ls>; पांड्योयमसांर्पितलंबहारः <ls>R. 6. 60</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 52</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 16.</ls> <ls>Me. 67</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 4</ls>; <ls n="Rs.">2. 18.</ls> {@--6@} War, battle. {@--7@} (In math.) The denominator of a fraction. {@--8@} A divisor. {@--9@} (In prosody) A long syllable.
